title: Transport Study of a MoTe2/WSe2 Heterostructure
description: Low-temperature electrical transport study of a MoTe2/WSe2 heterostructure (Device D3). The experiment, conducted at 4K and 50mK, uses a dual-gate geometry to map the device's conductance as a function of top and bottom gate voltages. The measurements reveal significant spatial inhomogeneity, with clear evidence of electronic domains. The study also includes magnetotransport sweeps and a Landau fan diagram showing quantum oscillations above 7T, indicating a high-quality electronic system.
